alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; Lincoln; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 9:09PM CDT until June 30 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lincoln County in central Kansas... Central Ellsworth County in central Kansas... Northwestern Saline County in central Kansas... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 908 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ellsworth, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Salina, Ellsworth, Kanopolis, Brookville, Beverly, Glendale, Westfall, Salina Airport and Ellsworth Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 89 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 214 and 256. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
